page.title: 04Farms near Sarn
page.content:
Cwmydrefor Farm has 70acres.We have about 115{sheep}200 lambs and 30{ {cattle}and calves.We have 4 sows and 2 sheepdogs.In the beginning of July we start to mow the{hay}and carry the bales.When we have finished the hay we have to dip the sheep and lambs to stop them catching maggots.
Pentrenant Farm We have been on our{farm}for eleven years.Our main enterprise is{milk {production},but we do have some sheep and calves.The milk is stored in a milk vat which is cooled to 40'F. and is situated in the dairy next to the milking parlour.The milk tanker comes into the yard,connects a big tube to the milk tank and takes the milk out by vacuum.
